attributes.action: Facilitate a post-covid concert day in all venues - free for care & NHS workers
attributes.additional_details: Let our care workers and NHS staff have something to look forward to
attributes.background:
Support the music industry to put together one day of concerts in all major UK venues

Ensure care workers and NHS staff who want to attend have a day off to attend

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for arranging concerns, this would be a matter for individual venues or event organisers.

We have published several petitions calling on the Government to reward or recognise NHS and care workers, which you might like to sign:

Incentivise NHS staff during the COVID19 outbreak by making wages untaxable: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Bonus for emergency services personnel working due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

Fund free Travel, Parking, Hotel & Childcare during COVID-19 for NHS staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305854

Fund free meals for NHS staff whilst on duty during the COVID19 Pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303485

Increase National Insurance by 5 pence to Increase Salaries for all NHS Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310518

Award all nursing staff in the NHS pay rise of 10%
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307

Pay rise for NHS and care staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313488 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
